title: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry appears EXTREMELY worse-for-wear at cash and carry gala
text:
Her Geordie Shore antics have become the stuff of legend - with her gaffes including urinating in the street, eating her dog's poo and sparking brawls.

And Chloe Ferry was up to her old tricks once more on Thursday evening as she appeared extremely worse-for-wear while living it up at the Elbrook Cash and Carry Charity Gala Dinner at CHAK 89 in Surrey.

The scandal-seeking star, 24, suffered an alarming malfunction as she emerged while donning a skin-tight nude unitard yet the scoop neckline meant she suffered a wardrobe malfunction due to her braless state.

Oh dear: Chloe Ferry was up to her old tricks once more on Thursday evening as she appeared extremely worse-for-wear while living it up at the ElbrookCash and Carry Charity Gala Dinner at CHAK 89 in Surrey

Chloe appeared to have overindulged slightly as she stumbled out of the event after glugging wine inside and taking a break on a step.

She seemed to be struggling to maintain her composure as she held her head in her hands while stumbling around and battling to stay upright.

While her hair was coiffed at the start of the evening, by the time the end of the night arose, she was covered in extensions while her hair was tangled.

Despite the gala status of the evening, she made a unique outfit choice in her nude unitard which showed off her incredible curves yet led to a wardrobe malfunction.

Hold on! The scandal-seeking star, 24, was worse-for-wear as she emerged while donning a skin-tight nude unitard yet the scoop neckline meant she suffered a wardrobe malfunction due to her braless state

Eek! Chloe appeared to have overindulged slightly as she stumbled out of the event after glugging wine inside and taking a break on a step

Homeward headed: Her cab driver seemed patient while she was slumped in the cab

Oops! She struggled throughout the evening - which seemed to be one of excess

The skin-tight one-piece featured a scooped neckline that offered a look at her ample cleavage, and cinched in at her incredibly tiny waist.

The unitard clung to her famously peachy posterior and displayed her tanned and toned pins, which had been elongated by a pair of lace up heels.

Earlier in the evening, Chloe completed the look by styling her platinum blonde locks loose and poker straight to frame her pretty features.

Stunner: She looked sensational in the ensemble yet struggled to keep the unitard in place

Uh oh: She could not keep her eyes open while leaving after a night of apparent excess

What have I done?! She came over unusually camera shy later in the evening as she sat on steps in a shocked state

Out and a pout: She felt giddy during the outing as she struggled to stay upright

Turning heads: The skintight one piece featured a scooped neckline that offered a look at her ample cleavage, and cinched in at her incredibly tiny waist

Chloe's outing came after her ex-boyfriend Sam Gowland made it clear he had moved on from her for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up.

Taking to Instagram last week, the reality star, 24, showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.'

Their relationship came crashing to an end when she dumped him after accusing him cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies.

Hold me close: She was getting close to her equally-glamorous pal

Front and centre: Chloe's outing came after her ex-boyfriend Sam Gowland made it clear he had moved on from her for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up

Taking the plunge: The skintight one piece featured a scooped neckline that offered a look at her ample cleavage, and cinched in at her incredibly tiny waist

Legs eleven! The unitard clung to her famously peachy posterior and displayed her tanned and toned pins, which had been elongated by a pair of lace up heels

Moving on: Chloe's outing came after her ex-boyfriend Sam Gowland made it clear he had moved on from her for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up

Transformation: Taking to Instagram, Sam, 24, showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending'

Beaming: Chloe Sims was also in attendance at the event with her BBF Pete Wicks

The large tattoo covered the previous one of Chloe's face, which he obtained when the duo appeared on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us in November last year. At the time, the star was furious with his ex, exclaiming: 'Why the f**k did you do that for?'

While Chloe, who initially picked the design so she could c**k block her partner, admitted some regret about her choice adding: 'I am regretting it a little bit now. I didn't think it would be that big!'

However, the tattoo is no longer a problem for Sam as he now sports a huge inking of a roaring bear on his leg.

Leggy! Demi Sims put on a leggy display in a thigh-skimming leather mini dress

Cosy: Chloe put on a cosy display with her pal Pete who looked dapper in a charcoal suit

Chatty: Chloe and Pete appeared deep in conversation while at the dinner table

Up close: Chloe held Pete's head between her hands in a sweet display of affection
description: The scandal-seeking star, 24, suffered an alarming worse-for-wear as she emerged while donning a skin-tight nude unitard yet the scoop neckline meant she suffered a wardrobe malfunction
